title: England await Billy Vunipola injury update following scan on ankle
text:
Billy Vunipola’s availability for England’s final pool C match against France remains uncertain after the No 8 underwent a scan on an ankle injury he sustained during the victory over Argentina.

Vunipola was withdrawn at half-time of England’s 39-10 victory over Argentina at the Tokyo Stadium on Saturday after twisting his ankle and he must wait until Tuesday to discover the seriousness of the injury.

England will not take any risks with the Saracens forward, having already secured qualification for the quarter-finals after three victories.

“He has had a scan and that is ongoing, and we will have a clearer picture tomorrow,” said assistant coach Neal Hatley on Monday. “He is being assessed and...
description: Billy Vunipola’s availability for England’s final pool C match against France remains uncertain after the No 8 underwent a scan on an ankle injury he sustained during the victory over Argentina.
